fields.description:
when i am trying to run commnad:

*titanium build --target device --platform android
then it gives following error :

*C:\Users\OM\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\titanium\node_modules\longjohn\dist
\longjohn.js:184
        e.stack;
         ^
processImmediate [as _immediateCallback] (timers.js:358:17)*

comments.body:
[~ommaurya] if you found a bug please post a test case, steps to reproduce and full information about the environment and logs, otherwise, if you have any other problems please go to community.appcelerator.com

BEst
